item.title: 《时代》年度人物公布，封面模仿经典影像被骂惨
item.guid: 《时代》年度人物公布，封面模仿经典影像被骂惨
item.description:
Yesterday, *Time* magazine in the US announced its 2025 "Person of the Year" – a group of tech industry leaders dubbed "AI Architects," reflecting the profound impact of artificial intelligence on today's world. 昨天，美国《时代》杂志公布了 2025 年「年度人物」—— 一组被称作「AI 架构师」的科技行业领军者，体现人工智能对当今世界的深远影响。

The cover emulates the classic 1932 photograph "Lunch atop a Skyscraper," placing eight tech leaders side-by-side on a steel beam, symbolizing their collective construction of the new era's technological framework. 封面模仿了 1932 年经典摄影作品「摩天楼上的午餐」，将 8 位科技领袖并排置于钢梁之上，象征共同搭建新时代的技术结构。

However, this design sparked controversy on social media, with many netizens criticizing it as "desecrating a timeless image of the working class" and even satirizing *Time* for becoming a "lapdog for tech monopolies." 然而，这一设计在社交媒体上引发争议，不少网友批评其「亵渎工人阶级的传世影像」，甚至讽刺《时代》成为「科技垄断巨头的『舔狗』」。

The eight figures appearing on the cover, from left to right, are: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg, AMD CEO Lisa Su, xAI founder Elon Musk, NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman, DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis, Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei, and Stanford University Professor Fei-Fei Li. 封面出现的八位人物从左至右依次为：Meta CEO 扎克伯格、AMD CEO 苏姿丰、xAI 创始人马斯克、英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋、OpenAI CEO 山姆 · 奥特曼、DeepMind CEO 戴米斯 · 哈萨比斯、Anthropic CEO 达里奥 · 阿莫代伊，以及斯坦福大学教授李飞飞。

*Time* states that the honorees "hold the wheel of history," with their technology and decisions reshaping information structures, climate governance, and lifestyles; NVIDIA, with its cutting-edge AI chips, has almost monopolized global supply and risen to become the world's most valuable company by market capitalization. Jensen Huang emphasized in an exclusive interview that "every industry needs AI" and predicted that AI will significantly raise the global economic ceiling. 《时代》称入选者「掌握着历史的转轮」，其技术与决策正在重塑资讯结构、气候治理与生活方式；英伟达凭借前沿 AI 芯片几乎垄断全球供给并跃升为全球市值最高公司，黄仁勋在专访中强调「每个产业都需要 AI」，并判断 AI 将显著抬升全球经济上限。

*Time*'s Person of the Year selection began in 1927. Over the years, it has featured political figures and also non-personal themes, such as "The Computer" in 1982, "Endangered Earth" in 1988, and "You" in 2006, reflecting societal changes and core issues of public concern. 《时代》年度人物评选始于 1927 年，历年既有政治人物，也曾以非个人主题呈现，如 1982 年的个人电脑、1988 年的濒危的地球与 2006 年的「你」，反映时代变迁与公共关注核心议题。

item.title: 「微信群崩了」冲上热搜，官方回复
item.guid: 「微信群崩了」冲上热搜，官方回复
item.description:
Yesterday, multiple netizens reported issues with "WeChat groups," including inability to send messages and delayed reception, with the related topic briefly topping Weibo's hot search list. 昨天，多位网民集中反映「微信群」消息出现无法发送、接收延迟等异常，相关话题一度登顶微博热搜。

In response, the Tencent WeChat team posted an apology that day, explaining it as "slight server jitters," and stating that services have now been restored. According to user feedback from various platforms, messages gradually displayed normally after a brief lag, and the outage had a short impact time and primarily affected group chats. 对此，腾讯微信团队当天发帖致歉，并解释为「服务器轻微抖动」，目前服务已恢复。从各平台用户反馈看，短暂卡顿后消息陆续正常显示，故障影响时间较短、范围以群聊为主。

item.title: iOS 26.2 正式版推送：锁屏字体 Liquid Glass 透明度可调，隔空投送验证码上线
item.guid: iOS-26.2-正式版推送：锁屏字体-Liquid-Glass-透明度可调，隔空投送验证码上线
item.description:
Yesterday, Apple officially pushed out the stable version updates for systems like iOS / iPadOS 26.2 and macOS 26.2 Tahoe, adding a Liquid Glass transparency adjustment slider for the time font on the lock screen, allowing users to reduce the glass effect as needed to improve readability. 昨天，苹果正式推送 iOS / iPadOS 26.2、macOS 26.2 Tahoe 等系统的正式版更新，在锁屏界面新增时间字体 Liquid Glass 透明度调节滑杆，用户可根据需求降低玻璃感以提升可读性。

Liquid Glass was introduced with iOS 26 and previously sparked controversy due to its excessive transparency affecting readability. Apple had already provided a "frosted" option in iOS 26.1, and this update further opens up custom adjustments. Design lead Alan Dye has since left for Meta, with interaction design director Stephen Lemay taking over. Liquid Glass 自 iOS 26 引入，曾因透明度过高影响阅读而引发争议，苹果在 iOS 26.1 已提供「磨砂」选项，此次进一步开放自定义调节，设计负责人 Alan Dye 已离职前往 Meta，由交互设计主管 Stephen Lemay 接任。

Regarding other features: 其他功能方面：

    AirDrop now includes a verification code, allowing a 30-day "known" relationship to be established with non-contacts for temporary sharing;

    Reminders now include an "Urgent" option, with automatic ringing upon due date;

    Apple Music supports offline lyrics;

    The Podcasts app gains automatic chapters and timed link features;

    AirPods real-time translation is now available in the EU;

    The US region adds "Enhanced Security Alerts," pushing maps and safety guidance when threats like floods and natural disasters arise.

Additionally, Apple also pushed out the stable versions of macOS 26.2, watchOS 26.2, visionOS 26.2, and tvOS 26.2. 此外，苹果还推送了 macOS 26.2、watchOS 26.2、visionOS 26.2、tvOS 26.2 系统的正式版。

On the security front, Apple fixed over 20 vulnerabilities, two of which were WebKit vulnerabilities already exploited by sophisticated attacks in older iOS versions, potentially leading to arbitrary code execution or memory corruption via malicious web pages. 安全层面，苹果修复超过 20 项漏洞，其中两项 WebKit 漏洞已被复杂攻击在旧版 iOS 中利用，可能导致恶意网页执行任意代码或内存破坏。

Other fixes include App Store payment token leakage risk, memory corruption caused by malicious image processing, hidden album authentication bypass, accidental password removal under FaceTime control, and more. Apple advises users to upgrade to the latest version as soon as possible to mitigate risks. 其他修复包括 App Store 支付令牌泄露风险、恶意图片处理导致内存破坏、隐藏相册绕过认证、FaceTime 控制下密码意外移除等。苹果建议用户尽快升级至最新版本以降低风险。

item.title: 小米回应「不让卖小米」传闻
item.guid: 小米回应「不让卖小米」传闻
item.description:
Yesterday, a spokesperson for Xiaomi responded to the viral video claiming "Xiaomi company doesn't allow selling millet," stating that the video is completely false, a distortion and slander. 昨天，小米公司发言人回应网传「小米公司不让卖小米」的视频内容，称该视频完全失实，属歪曲与污蔑。

The Xiaomi spokesperson stated that their previous complaints against relevant accounts targeted malicious imitation, fabrication of slander, and actions infringing upon the company's and its executives' reputation, not the normal use of the word "Xiaomi" or Xiaomi agricultural products. 小米公司发言人表示，其此前对相关账号的投诉，针对的是恶意模仿、捏造污蔑，侵害公司及公司高管名誉的行为，并非针对小米二字或小米农产品的正常使用。

Xiaomi emphasized that misinterpreting the complaint as prohibiting the use of the word "Xiaomi" is a distortion of concepts, using the guise of supporting farmers to engage in slander, rumor-mongering, and traffic-seeking. The company will legally defend its rights, say no to false online information and deliberate incitement of public opinion, and jointly create a clean and upright online public discourse environment. 小米强调，将投诉曲解为不让用小米二字，是偷换概念，以助农议题为名，行污蔑造谣、博取流量之实。公司将依法维权，对虚假网络信息与刻意挑动网络舆情行为说不，共同营造风清气正的网络舆论空间。

item.title: 美国上诉法院撤回苹果与 Epic Games 案部分禁令：iOS 外链支付可收「适当费用」
item.guid: 美国上诉法院撤回苹果与-Epic-Games-案部分禁令：iOS-外链支付可收「适当费用」
item.description:
According to The Verge, the U.S. Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals yesterday issued its latest ruling in the long-running legal dispute between Apple and Epic Games. 据 The Verge 报道，美国第九巡回上诉法院昨天对苹果与 Epic Games 的长期法律纠纷作出最新裁决。

The court confirmed that Apple was in contempt of court regarding the 2021 external payment link injunction, but overturned the previous ruling that "completely prohibited Apple from collecting commissions," allowing Apple to charge "reasonable fees" for purchases made via external links within iOS apps in the future. 法院确认苹果在 2021 年外链支付禁令中存在藐视法庭行为， 但推翻了此前「全面禁止苹果收取佣金」的判决，允许苹果未来对通过 iOS 应用内外链完成的购买收取「合理费用」。

However, the specific rates have not yet been determined, and the case has been remanded to the district court for reconsideration or will be decided through negotiation between the parties. Until reasonable rates are established, Apple may not collect commissions on sales completed through third-party payment systems (including Epic). 不过，目前具体费率尚未确定，案件已发回地方法院重新审理或由双方协商决定。 在合理费率出台前，苹果不得就第三方支付系统（包括 Epic）完成的销售抽取佣金。

The court noted that the district court's previous "zero commission" ruling was more akin to a punitive measure than a reasonable civil sanction. 法院指出，地方法院此前的「零佣金」裁决更像是惩罚性措施，而非合理的民事制裁。

The new ruling emphasizes that reasonable fees should be based on the necessary costs incurred by Apple for managing external links and provide some compensation for its intellectual property usage, but must not include security and privacy related fees. 新裁决强调，合理费用应基于苹果为外链管理产生的必要成本，并对其知识产权使用给予一定补偿，但不得包含安全与隐私方面的费用。

At the same time, the court partially relaxed restrictions on external link design, allowing Apple to prohibit developers from using fonts, sizes, and positions more prominent than in-app purchase buttons, but must at least allow developers to place external payment options using the same specifications as Apple's own buttons. 同时，法院部分放宽了对外链设计的限制， 允许苹果禁止开发者使用比应用内购按钮更醒目的字体、尺寸和位置，但必须至少允许开发者使用与苹果自有按钮相同的规格放置外链支付选项。

Additionally, according to engadget, after reaching a settlement with Google last month, Fortnite was relisted on the US Google Play Store yesterday. Earlier this year, the game also returned to the iOS platform. 此外，据 engadget 报道，在上月与 Google 达成和解后，《堡垒之夜》已于昨天重新上架美国 Google Play 商店。今年稍早，该游戏也在 iOS 平台回归。

Epic Games CEO Tim Sweeney stated that he would not agree to share revenue generated through external links in iOS apps with Apple. Epic Games CEO Tim Sweeney 表示，他不会同意与苹果分享通过 iOS 应用外部链接产生的收入。

Sweeney called the ruling a 'complete repudiation' of Apple's previous theories on access fees and said the move could influence overseas regulatory attitudes. Sweeney 称该裁决「彻底否定了」 苹果以往关于访问费用的理论，并表示此举可能影响海外监管态度。

He accepted a fixed fee directly related to the workload of reviewing external links but rejected any proportional share of off-store transactions. He also criticized Apple for deliberately making external links 'difficult to use' and stated that Epic would not pay commissions for external purchases. 他接受与外部链接审核工作量直接相关的固定费用，但拒绝任何对商店外交易的比例分成。他还批评苹果曾刻意让外部链接「难以使用」，并表示 Epic 不会为外部购买支付佣金。

item.title: 央视起底汽车行业网络「黑嘴」：法院判赔最高 201.87 万元
item.guid: 央视起底汽车行业网络「黑嘴」：法院判赔最高-201.87-万元
item.description:
CCTV News Channel's 'Rule of Law Online' program yesterday exposed the operating model of online 'black mouths' in the automotive industry. 中央电视台新闻频道「法治在线」栏目昨天起底汽车行业网络「黑嘴」运作模式。

CCTV started by examining methods such as 'publishing smear articles,' 'extortion,' 'posing as experts,' 'live-streaming sales,' 'creating opposition,' and 'slandering,' outlining the chain where self-media fabricate negative content, conduct malicious evaluations, create public opinion, and then demand so-called 'protection fees' by threatening 'deletion of negative content' or 'business cooperation'. 央视从「发黑稿」「敲竹杠」「扮专家」「带货」「搞对立」「泼脏水」等手法入手，梳理自媒体通过编造负面、恶意测评、制造舆情后再以「删除负面」「商业合作」为要挟索取所谓「保护费」的链条。

The report named 'Longzhu Jiche' for long-term publishing insulting and defamatory content against BYD, even using 'photoshopped' fire videos to spread rumors of 'vehicle self-explosion.' The court's second-instance judgment ruled that it constituted defamation, ordering the deletion of content, public apology, and compensation to BYD for economic losses of 2.0187 million yuan; 报道点名「龙猪集车」长期针对比亚迪发布侮辱、抹黑内容，甚至用「移花接木」的起火视频造谣「车辆自爆」，法院二审判决其构成名誉侵权，责令删除内容、公开致歉，并赔偿比亚迪经济损失 201.87 万元；

'Big Eye Brother Talks Cars' maliciously insulted Great Wall Motors under the guise of 'patriotism' and 'justice,' and was ordered to delete videos, publicly apologize, and pay 200,000 yuan in compensation; 'Teacher Long Talks EVs' long-term spread unverified false information, maliciously slandering Xpeng Motors, and was ordered to immediately delete all infringing videos, publicly apologize, and pay 100,000 yuan in compensation. 「大眼哥说车」打着「爱国」「正义」旗号恶意辱骂长城汽车，被判删除视频、公开道歉并赔偿 20 万元；「龙老师讲电车」长期散布未经核实的不实信息，恶意抹黑小鹏汽车，被判立即删除全部侵权视频、公开致歉并赔偿 10 万元。

Recently, the Cyberspace Administration of China, in conjunction with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology and other departments, has continuously carried out special rectification of online chaos in the automotive industry, severely cracking down on illegal and non-compliant behaviors such as malicious defamation and attacks, spreading false information, and conducting fake evaluations, and has successively reported two batches of typical cases: 近期，国家网信办会同工业和信息化部等部门持续开展汽车行业网络乱象专项整治，重拳治理恶意抹黑攻击、散布不实信息、开展虚假测评等违法违规行为，并连续通报两批典型案例：

Including accounts like 'Che Baotai,' 'An Ye Yue Che,' 'Zhi Jia An Quan Bang,' 'She Jian Cai Jing,' and 'Nuo Ren Tang Tang,' which collected negative content, published false evaluations, distorted interpretations of publicly available corporate information, and disrupted market order through homogenization. The involved accounts have been dealt with according to law and regulations. 包括「车曝台」「暗夜曰车」「智驾安全榜」「奢见财经」「糯人糖糖」等账号集纳负面、发布不实测评、歪曲解读涉企公开信息、同质化扰乱市场秩序的问题，涉案账号已依法依约处置。

Relevant officials stated that online chaos in the automotive industry severely undermines fair market competition and pollutes the online ecosystem. The 'fan circle' tendency exacerbates mutual attacks and stigmatization among fans, and must be severely cracked down on with a zero-tolerance attitude. 相关负责人表示，汽车行业网络乱象严重破坏市场公平竞争、污染网络生态，「饭圈化」倾向加剧粉丝间相互攻击、贴污名化标签，必须以零容忍态度严厉打击。

item.title: 京东高薪招募端侧 AI 芯片人才，薪酬最高可达 100K
item.guid: 京东高薪招募端侧-AI-芯片人才，薪酬最高可达-100K
item.description:
According to a report by 'STAR Market Daily,' JD.com recently launched a recruitment drive for edge AI chip talent, focusing on 'in-memory computing' chip design engineer positions, with recruitment directions involving hardware application scenarios such as robots and smart home appliances. 据《科创板日报》报道，京东近期启动端侧 AI 芯片人才招募，重点集中在「存算一体」芯片设计工程师岗位，招聘方向涉及机器人、智能家电等硬件应用场景。

The compensation package is '40K – 100K × 20 months' salary,' with the specific range depending on the candidate's technical background and project experience. 薪酬方案为「40K – 100K × 20 薪」，具体区间取决于候选人的技术背景与项目经验。

JD.com emphasizes that candidates need to have published high-quality papers in top conferences or journals, or possess technical patents and competition awards, to demonstrate their technical strength and innovation capabilities. 京东强调，候选人需在顶级会议或期刊发表过高质量论文，或拥有技术专利、赛事奖项，以体现技术实力与创新能力。

According to Sina Finance, JD.com previously launched the 'Top Young Technology Genius Program' (TGT), open to undergraduate, master's, and doctoral students from global universities and technical talents within two years of graduation. 据新浪财经报道，此前，京东已推出「顶尖青年技术天才计划」（TGT），面向全球高校本硕博学生及毕业两年内的技术人才开放。

The program covers 8 directions, including multimodal large models, machine learning, search recommendation advertising, spatial and embodied intelligence, high-performance computing and cloud computing, big data, AI infrastructure, and security. The program has no salary cap, has issued hundreds of offers, and provides 18,000 core positions for 2025 graduates. 该计划涵盖多模态大模型、机器学习、搜索推荐广告、空间与具身智能、高性能与云计算、大数据、AI 基础设施、安全等 8 个方向。该计划不设薪酬上限，已发放上百个 offer，并为 2025 届毕业生提供 1.8 万个核心岗位。

Financially, JD.com's financial report shows that its revenue reached 299.1 billion yuan in the third quarter of 2025, with R&D investment of 5.6 billion yuan, providing assurance for high-salary recruitment. 财务层面，京东财报显示，2025 年三季度收入达 2991 亿元，研发投入 56 亿元，为高薪招聘提供保障。

item.title: Reddit 起诉澳大利亚社媒禁令
item.guid: Reddit-起诉澳大利亚社媒禁令
item.description:
According to Xinhua News Agency, less than three days after taking effect, Australia's 'social media ban' for individuals under 16 years old has been sued by US social media platform Reddit. 据新华网报道，生效不到三天，澳大利亚针对 16 岁以下人群的「社媒禁令」遭美国社交平台 Reddit 起诉。

Reddit yesterday submitted legal documents to the Australian High Court, requesting the court to declare the relevant laws invalid, or to rule that the injunction does not apply to its platform. Reddit 于昨天向澳大利亚高等法院递交法律文书，要求法院宣告相关法律无效，或裁定该禁令不适用于其平台。

In the documents, Reddit emphasized that it is a "public forum" rather than a platform primarily for users to engage in online social interaction, and stated that access settings for users under 16 have already restricted certain types of potentially harmful content. 在文书中，Reddit 强调自身是「公共论坛」，而非主要供用户进行在线社交互动的平台，并称对 16 岁以下用户的访问设置已限制可能有害的特定类型内容。

An Australian government spokesperson, responding to the lawsuit, stated that the government's position is "on the side of Australian parents and children, not the platforms," and affirmed that it will " steadfastly protect Australian young people from the harms of social media." 澳政府发言人在回应起诉时表示，政府立场是「站在澳大利亚父母和孩子一边，而不是平台一边」，并称将「坚定不移地保护澳大利亚年轻人免受社交媒体的伤害」。

Previously, the Australian Federal Parliament passed an amendment in November last year, requiring specific social media platforms to take "reasonable measures" to prevent individuals under 16 from having accounts on their platforms; non-compliant companies will face fines of up to 49.5 million Australian dollars (approximately 2.3 billion RMB), but underage violators and their guardians will not be penalized. 此前，澳联邦议会于去年 11 月通过修正案，要求特定社交媒体采取「合理措施」阻止未满 16 岁的人在其平台拥有账户；不配合的企业最高将面临 4950 万澳元（约合 23 亿元人民币）罚款，但违规的未成年人及其监护人不受处罚。

Since the amendment was passed, the Australian government has dynamically adjusted the list of platforms required to enforce the ban based on specific circumstances. In addition to Reddit, the list includes 10 other online platforms such as Facebook, YouTube, TikTok, X, and Instagram. 自修正案通过以来，澳政府根据具体情况动态调整需执行禁令的平台名单，在列的除 Reddit 外，还包括 Facebook、YouTube、TikTok、X、Instagram 等 10 个在线平台。

Research by the Australian government's eSafety Commissioner shows that 96% of 10-to-15-year-olds use social media, and 70% of them have been exposed to harmful content. The government emphasizes that minimum age restrictions can reduce the negative impact of social media. 澳政府电子安全机构研究显示，96% 的 10 岁至 15 岁青少年使用社交媒体，其中 70% 的人接触过有害内容。政府强调，最低年龄限制措施可减少社交媒体带来的负面影响。

However, according to previous reports by Bloomberg, as the ban came into effect, Reddit had already launched new safety features globally for users under 18, including stricter chat settings and personalized ad restrictions. 不过，据此前彭博社报道，在禁令生效之际，Reddit 曾提前在全球范围内为未满 18 岁用户推出新的安全功能，包括更严格的聊天设置和个性化广告限制。

This feature will be automatically applied to accounts identified as underage users and will be verified in Australia in conjunction with an age prediction model. 该功能将自动应用于被识别为未成年用户的账户，并在澳大利亚配合年龄预测模型进行验证。

item.title: 拓竹接入腾讯混元 3D 3.0，可将 AI 手办变成实物
item.guid: 拓竹接入腾讯混元-3D-3.0，可将-AI-手办变成实物
item.description:
Yesterday, Tencent Hunyuan announced that MakerWorld, a subsidiary of Bambu Lab, has officially integrated with Tencent Hunyuan 3D 3.0 large model. The two parties jointly launched a figurine generator named "Print You," aiming to help ordinary users complete 3D modeling through AI technology, further lowering the creative threshold for consumer-grade 3D printing. 昨天，腾讯混元宣布拓竹科技旗下 MakerWorld 正式接入腾讯混元 3D 3.0 大模型，双方联合推出名为「印你」的手办生成器，旨在通过 AI 技术帮助普通用户完成 3D 建模，进一步降低消费级 3D 打印的创作门槛。

Compared to the past, which required reliance on expensive scanning equipment or time-consuming manual construction, "Print You" greatly simplifies the process into 3 steps: simply upload – design – model to complete. 相比过往需要依赖昂贵扫描设备或耗时的人工作建，「印你」将流程极大简化为 3 步，仅需上传 – 设计 – 建模即可完成。

Specifically, users only need to upload a portrait image, and the system can automatically generate a 2D stereogram, perform automatic background removal and stylization, and further convert it into a high-quality, directly printable 3D model, accurately restoring facial features, clothing, and posture. 具体来看，用户仅需上传一张人像图片，系统可自动生成 2D 立体图、执行自动去背景与风格化处理，并进一步转换为高质量、可直接打印的 3D 模型，精确还原面容、衣着和姿态。

item.title: lululemon 第三季度营收增长 7%，中国大陆营收同比大增 46%
item.guid: lululemon-第三季度营收增长-7%，中国大陆营收同比大增-46%
item.description:
lululemon yesterday released its Q3 FY2025 earnings report, with the Chinese mainland market showing outstanding performance. lululemon 于昨天发布 2025 财年第三季度业绩报告，其中中国大陆市场表现亮眼。

Data shows that the company's global net revenue increased by 7% year-over-year, reaching $2.6 billion. International markets performed particularly well, with net revenue growing by 33%, while the Chinese mainland market recorded a 46% increase. When calculated at constant dollars, the Chinese mainland market's increase reached 47%. 数据显示，公司全球净营收同比增长 7%，达到 26 亿美元，其中国际市场表现尤为突出，净营收同比增长 33%，中国大陆市场则录得 46% 的增幅。若以固定美元计算，中国大陆市场增幅更达 47%。

lululemon CEO Calvin McDonald stated during the earnings call: lululemon CEO Calvin McDonald 在财报电话会议中表示：

"In the third quarter, we continued to focus on improving performance in the U.S. market while maintaining strong growth momentum in international markets. With the holiday season approaching, we are pleased with our current achievements and grateful for the team's continued dedication to our guests and communities."

He specifically mentioned that the Chinese mainland business maintained strong momentum this quarter, and the full-year net revenue growth rate is expected to reach or exceed the previously provided guidance high range of 20% to 25%. 他特别提到，中国大陆业务在本季度保持强劲态势，预计全年净营收增速将达到或优于此前给出的 20% 至 25% 指引高区间。

She added that the company expects to open approximately 46 new directly operated stores and complete the optimization of about 36 stores this year, with most of the new stores opening in the Chinese market. 她补充称，公司预计今年新增约 46 家直营门店，并完成约 36 家门店优化，其中大部分新店将落地中国市场。

Furthermore, on October 27, lululemon relocated its China Store Support Center to Shanghai West Bund Central, fully occupying a five-story standalone office building. 此外，lululemon 于 10 月 27 日将中国门店支持中心迁至上海西岸中环，全面入驻五层独栋办公楼。

The company expects net revenue for Q4 FY2025 to be between $3.575 billion and $3.585 billion, full-year net revenue to be between $10.962 billion and $11.047 billion, and full-year diluted earnings per share to be between $12.92 and $13.02. 公司预计 2025 财年第四季度净营收将在 35.75 亿美元至 35.85 亿美元之间，全年净营收预计在 109.62 亿美元至 110.47 亿美元之间，全年每股摊薄收益预计在 12.92 美元至 13.02 美元之间。

item.title: 💡 李彦宏：2025 年是 AI 应用普及关键年，机会在应用层
item.guid: 💡-李彦宏：2025-年是-AI-应用普及关键年，机会在应用层
item.description:
According to Shangguan News, Baidu founder Robin Li stated in yesterday's "AI Architect" special interview with Time magazine that 2025 will be a critical year for the popularization of AI applications. 据上观新闻报道，百度创始人李彦宏在昨天《时代》周刊「AI 架构师」专题采访中表示，2025 年将是 AI 应用普及的关键一年。

He predicts that only a few foundational model layers will remain, but many successful participants will emerge in various application layer directions, "I believe that's where the most opportunities are." 他判断，基础模型层最终会留下少数几家，但应用层的各个方向将涌现众多成功参与者，「我认为那里才是机会最多的地方」。

He emphasized that Baidu adopts an "application-driven" strategy, training models specifically for key areas like search and digital humans to gain an advantage, rather than pursuing a "one-size-fits-all model" for everyone. 他强调，百度采取「应用驱动」策略，针对 搜索、数字人等重点领域 定向训练模型以形成优势，而非追求面向所有人的「万能模型」。

Robin Li stated that the global AI competition is intensifying. Unlike the mainstream US tech industry's heavy investment in AGI development, China focuses more on applications and has unique scenarios like manufacturing and a real need for low-cost, high-efficiency solutions. "We need to leverage AI to solve these challenges." 李彦宏表示，全球 AI 竞争态势趋于白热化。与美国科技界主流投入巨资发展 AGI 不同，中国更关注应用，并拥有制造业等独特场景与低成本高效率的现实需求，「我们需要利用 AI 来解决这些挑战」。

He further stated that Baidu has released "Jiamou," a commercially viable, self-evolving super intelligent agent for real industrial scenarios, to seek "globally optimal solutions," demonstrating algorithmic reasoning advantages and technological competitiveness in public performance benchmarks and multiple authoritative evaluations. 他进一步提出，百度面向真实产业场景发布可商用自我演化超级智能体「伽谋」，以寻求「全局最优解」，并在公开性能基准测试与多项权威评测中展现算法推理优势与技术竞争力。

Regarding technology trends, he predicted that decisive breakthroughs in the industry would be in multimodal AI, especially hoping to drive revolutionary changes in drug research and development with AI. 谈及技术趋势，他预计行业的决定性突破将在多模态，尤其在药物研发领域希望以 AI 推动革命性变革。

Furthermore, he reiterated that Baidu's model training aims to solve application-layer problems, "I don't think we should create a super intelligent AI that can do everything for everyone." 此外，他重申百度训练模型旨在解决应用层问题，「我不认为我们应该去创造一个能为所有人做所有事的超级智能 AI」。

In a broader industry context, Robin Li has repeatedly emphasized "application-driven" strategies: he pointed out in a previous interview with GeekPark, "Yesterday everyone was competing on chips, models, and so on, but I have always said we should compete on applications; applications are where true value is created ." 在更广泛的行业语境中，李彦宏多次强调「应用驱动」：他在此前接受《极客公园》采访时指出，「昨天大家在卷芯片、卷模型等等， 我一直是说要卷应用，应用才是真正创造价值的地方 」。

item.title: 苹果 AirTag 2 曝光：优化移动场景定位，或于 2026 年初发布
item.guid: 苹果-AirTag-2-曝光：优化移动场景定位，或于-2026-年初发布
item.description:
According to MacRumors, Apple is bringing a series of feature upgrades to AirTag 2, focusing on smoother pairing, more precise "Precision Finding" location capabilities, detailed battery display, and optimized tracking in mobile scenarios and crowded environments. 据 MacRumors 报道，苹果正在为 AirTag 2 带来一系列功能升级，重点包括更顺畅的配对流程、更精准的「Precision Finding」 定位功能、细化的电量显示，以及在移动场景和人群密集环境下的追踪优化。

Leaks indicate that the identifier "2025AirTag" appeared in iOS 26 internal test code, suggesting the product was originally planned for a 2025 release, but is now more likely to debut in early 2026. 爆料显示，iOS 26 内部测试代码中出现了「2025AirTag」 的标识，显示该产品原本计划在 2025 年发布，但目前更可能在 2026 年初亮相。

On the hardware front, the new AirTag is expected to feature a new UWB chip to extend the effective range of Precision Finding. Its appearance will continue the original circular design with a replaceable battery, but the speaker will be upgraded and made more difficult to remove, enhancing reliability and tamper resistance. 硬件层面，新 AirTag 预计会采用全新的 UWB 芯片，以扩展精确查找的有效范围，外观延续初代的圆盘设计与可更换电池，但扬声器将升级并更难被拆除，以提升可靠性和防篡改能力。

Notably, the same batch of code also showed signs of the next-generation HomePod mini (equipped with an S10 chip) and the previously rumored AI Siri. 值得注意的是，同一批代码还出现了下一代 HomePod mini（搭载 S10 芯片）以及早前网传 AI Siri 的迹象。

item.title: 蚂蚁开源业内首个 100B 扩散语言模型 LLaDA2.0
item.guid: 蚂蚁开源业内首个-100B-扩散语言模型-LLaDA2.0
item.description:
Yesterday, Ant Technology Research Institute, in collaboration with Renmin University, Zhejiang University, and Westlake University, launched the "LLaDA2.0" series of diffusion language models, including 16B "mini" and 100B "flash" versions with MoE architecture, claiming to be the industry's first 100B-level diffusion language model (dLLM). 昨天，蚂蚁技术研究院联合人大、浙大、西湖大学推出扩散语言模型系列「LLaDA2.0」，包含 MoE 架构的 16B「mini」与 100B「flash」两版，宣称为业内首个 100B 级扩散语言模型（dLLM）。

The team stated that the model performs on par with or shows advantages over strong autoregressive (AR) models in multi-dimensional evaluations across knowledge, reasoning, coding, mathematics, and agent capabilities, and has open-sourced its weights and related technical reports on Hugging Face. 团队表示，模型在知识、推理、编码、数学与智能体等多维评测中与强自回归（AR）模型持平或展现优势，并已在 Hugging Face 开源权重与相关技术报告。

The officially released model card shows that LLaDA2.0-flash is a MoE diffusion language model with 100B total parameters, where inference only activates about 6.1B expert parameters, significantly reducing computational costs. It performs outstandingly in coding and complex reasoning tasks, and also demonstrates good capabilities in tool calling and agent tasks. 官方公开的模型卡显示，LLaDA2.0-flash 为 100B 总参数的 MoE 扩散语言模型，推理仅激活约 6.1B 专家参数，显著降低计算成本；在编码与复杂推理任务上表现突出，工具调用与智能体任务亦有较好能力。

Zhao Junbo, a senior technical expert at Ant Group, emphasized that the diffusion architecture can "directly modify and control tokens" during the inference process, eliminating the need to regenerate entire content segments like autoregressive (AR) models. This theoretically promises faster generation speeds and lower computational costs. 蚂蚁集团资深技术专家赵俊博强调，扩散架构在推理过程中可「直接修改与控制 token」，无需像自回归（AR）模型重新生成整段内容，理论上更有望实现更快生成速度与更低计算成本。

📖 Technical Report: https://github.com/inclusionAI/LLaDA2.0/blob/main/tech_report.pdf 📖 技术报告： https://github.com/inclusionAI/LLaDA2.0/blob/main/tech_report.pdf

item.title: Runway 推出 GWM‑1 通用世界模型，AI 视频生成跨越至「世界建模」
item.guid: Runway-推出-GWM‑1-通用世界模型，AI-视频生成跨越至「世界建模」
item.description:
Recently, Runway announced the launch of its general "World Model" family, GWM-1, and simultaneously updated its flagship video generation model, Gen-4.5. 近日，Runway 宣布推出通用「世界模型」家族 GWM-1，并同步更新其旗舰视频生成模型 Gen‑4.5。

GWM-1 is built upon Gen-4.5, capable of frame-by-frame generation, real-time operation, and interactive control through actions like camera pose, robot commands, and audio. It includes three post-training variants: "GWM Worlds," "GWM Avatars," and "GWM Robotics." GWM-1 基于 Gen‑4.5 构建，可逐帧生成、实时运行，并通过摄像机姿态、机器人指令、音频等动作进行交互式控制，包含「GWM Worlds」「GWM Avatars」「GWM Robotics」三种后训练变体：

    GWM Worlds can maintain spatial coherence in long-duration motion sequences, allowing the definition of environmental geometry, lighting, and physical rules, and responding accurately to input actions;

    GWM Robotics is described as a "learning simulator" trained on robotic data, capable of generating action-conditioned video rollouts, supporting "counterfactual" generation to explore different trajectories and outcomes, thereby reducing the risks of expensive real-world data collection and offline testing;

    GWM Avatars is an audio-driven interactive video generation model that can stably present natural human movements and expressions (facial expressions, eye movements, lip synchronization, gestures) during long conversations, suitable for real-time tutoring and education, customer support and service, training simulations, interactive entertainment and gaming, and other scenarios.

Runway stated in the livestream that its strategy is expanding from film and television production to robotics, physics, and life sciences, emphasizing that world models are at the forefront of AI progress: language models alone cannot solve problems like robotics, diseases, and scientific discoveries; true progress requires models to experience the world in simulated environments and learn from mistakes, just like humans. Runway 在直播中称，其战略正从影视制作扩展至机器人、物理与生命科学，并强调世界模型位于 AI 进步前沿：仅靠语言模型难以解决机器人技术、疾病、科学发现等问题，真正的进步需要模型像人类一样在模拟环境中体验世界并从错误中学习。

Gen‑4.5's updates focus on visual fidelity and creative control, adding capabilities such as native audio generation and editing, and multi-shot video editing; the official statement also acknowledges common limitations in current video generation, such as causal reasoning, object permanence, and success bias, which will be continuously iterated upon as key research directions for world models. Gen‑4.5 的更新集中在画面保真度与创意控制，并新增原生音频生成与编辑、多镜头视频编辑等能力；官方同时承认现阶段视频生成仍存在因果推理、客体恒存性与成功偏差等常见局限，这些问题将作为世界模型研究的重点方向持续迭代。

item.title: 山姆 680 元年卡推销成员工核心 KPI，未完成或被点名检讨
item.guid: 山姆-680-元年卡推销成员工核心-KPI，未完成或被点名检讨
item.description:
According to China News Service, Sam's Club has recently significantly escalated its promotion of the "Excellence Card" with an annual fee of 680 yuan in stores nationwide, with some members reporting being repeatedly recommended the card from entry to checkout despite multiple refusals. 据中新网报道，近期山姆会员店在全国门店内对「680 元年费『卓越卡』」的推销明显升级，部分会员反映从入口到结账环节屡次拒绝仍被推荐。

Some employees revealed that card sales have been included in frontline staff's core KPIs. Failure to complete will result in public naming at meetings, writing self-criticisms, and other penalties. For each successful card promotion, employees can receive a commission of approximately 30 yuan. 有员工透露，卖卡已被纳入一线员工核心 KPI，未完成将面临在会议上被公开点名、书写检讨等处理，每成功推广一张卡员工可获约 30 元提成。

In terms of operational procedures, promotions require collaboration with China Minsheng Bank credit card promoters, attempting to engage every customer at checkout; to reduce new member card returns, it is stipulated that at least two online purchases must be completed before a card can be returned. With the advancement of this "expansion and efficiency improvement" strategy, Sam's Club opened 9 new stores this year, bringing the total number nationwide to 61. 在运营流程上，推销需与民生银行信用卡推广人员协同，对每位结账顾客进行尝试；为减少新办会员退卡，规定需完成至少两次线上消费方可退卡。伴随这一「扩张、提效」策略推进，山姆今年新开设 9 家门店，全国总数达 61 家。

In addition to the intensity of promotions, consumer doubts about product quality and selection standards are increasing. 除推销强度外，消费者对产品质量与选品标准的质疑升温。

As of press time, the number of complaints against Sam's Club on the Black Cat Complaint Platform has exceeded 13,000, focusing on issues such as food safety and false advertising; its private label Member's Mark (MM) has been accused of "visible degradation," such as organic soybean grade dropping from level 1 to level 3 while prices remain unchanged, and controversies over "mass market" product selection are also increasing. 截止发稿，黑猫投诉平台针对山姆的投诉量已突破 1.3 万条，集中于食品安全与虚假宣传等问题；自有品牌 Member’s Mark（MM）被指出现「肉眼可见的降级」，如有机大豆等级由 1 级降至 3 级但价格未变，选品「大众化」争议亦增多。

Previously, Sam's Club responded to the "live mouse found in original mochi packaging box" incident by stating that a full-chain investigation had been completed, with a preliminary judgment that it was caused by accidental pest intrusion around the pickup point, and apologized to the consumer; concurrently, Shanghai market supervision authorities had fined Sam's Club for selling unqualified children's products, further raising members' concerns about its quality control. 此前，山姆方面回应「原味麻薯包装箱内出现活老鼠」事件称已完成全链路核查，初步判断为取货点周边虫害偶然侵入导致，并与消费者沟通致歉；同时，上海市场监管部门曾因销售不合格儿童用品对山姆处以罚款，引发会员对其品控的进一步担忧。

At the beginning of the year, following adjustments to Sam's Club China's management, the new acting president, Jane Ewing, promoted a strategic transformation centered on "accelerating scale expansion, strengthening data-driven operations, and reducing costs to improve efficiency." 年初，山姆中国管理层调整后，新任代理总裁 Jane Ewing 推动以「加速规模扩张、强化数据驱动、压降成本提升效率」为核心的策略转型。

Against the backdrop of measures such as compressed supply chain and new product development cycles, changes in MM category structure, and a reduction in the proportion of imported goods, Sam's Club has achieved significant net sales growth in China, while also facing a re-evaluation of "whether it's still worth it" from approximately 9 million paying members. 在供应链与新品开发周期压缩、MM 品类结构占比变化、进口商品比例下调等举措的背景下，山姆一方面实现中国区净销售额显著增长，另一方面也面临约 900 万付费会员的「是否仍然值得」再评估。

item.title: TGA 2025 获奖名单公布，《光与影：33 号远征队》横扫九项大奖
item.guid: TGA-2025-获奖名单公布，《光与影：33-号远征队》横扫九项大奖
item.description:
Yesterday, TGA 2025, dubbed the "Oscars of Gaming," officially concluded, with "Light and Shadow: Expedition 33" by French studio Sandfall Interactive emerging as the biggest winner. 昨天，被称为「游戏奥斯卡」的 TGA 2025 正式落幕，法国工作室 Sandfall Interactive 打造的《光与影：33 号远征队》成为最大赢家。

This independent title, blending art, action, and RPG elements, received 13 nominations across 11 categories, ultimately securing the " Nine-Crown King " title for Game of the Year, Best Game Direction, Best Narrative, Best Art Direction, Best Score and Music, Best Performance, Best Independent Game, Best Debut Game, and Best Role-Playing Game, setting a new record. 这款融合艺术、动作与 RPG 要素的独立作品在 11 个组别中获得 13 项提名，并最终斩获年度最佳游戏、最佳游戏指导、最佳叙事、最佳美术、最佳配乐、最佳演出、最佳独立游戏、最佳首秀游戏、最佳角色扮演游戏 九冠王 ，创下纪录。

Beyond Game of the Year, other awards also had their highlights: 除年度游戏外，其他奖项也各有亮点：

    “Battlefield 6” won Best Audio Design

    “Hades II” won Best Action Game

    “Hollow Knight: Silksong” took Best Action/Adventure

    “Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves” won Best Fighting Game

    《ARC Raiders》 won Best Multiplayer Game

    《Final Fantasy Tactics: Ivalice Chronicles》 won Best Simulation/Strategy Game

    《Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze》 won Best Family Game

    《Mario Kart World》 won Best Sports/Racing Game

    《Uma Musume Pretty Derby》 won Best Mobile Game

    《No Man's Sky》 won Best Ongoing Game

    《South of Midnight》 won Games for Impact

    《The Last of Us Season 2》 won Best Adaptation

    《Baldur's Gate 3》 won Best Community Support

    《Walkabout Mini Golf》 won Best VR/AR Game

    《GTA VI》 won Most Anticipated Game

    《Wuthering Waves》 won Player's Voice

    《CS2》 won Best Esports Game

    Chovy Jeong Ji-hoon won Best Esports Athlete, Team Vitality won Best Esports Team, and MoistCr1TiKaL won Content Creator of the Year.

This year's TGA was described as a "clash of gods," with steady sequels, continuous surprises from new IPs, and AAA and indie titles advancing side-by-side, showcasing the creators' passion and perseverance. 今年的 TGA 被形容为「神仙打架」，续作稳健，新 IP 惊喜不断，AAA 与独立作品齐头并进，展现了创作者们的热情与坚持。

item.title: 《F1：狂飙飞车》登陆 Apple TV
item.guid: 《F1：狂飙飞车》登陆-Apple-TV
item.description:
Yesterday, "F1: Apex," starring Brad Pitt, officially launched its streaming service globally via Apple TV. 昨天，布拉德 · 皮特主演的《F1：狂飙飞车》正式通过 Apple TV 在全球范围上线流媒体服务。

The film tells the story of Sonny Hayes (played by Brad Pitt), a driver who was forced to retire in the 1990s due to a racing accident. Thirty years later, he joins the struggling F1 APXGP team, challenging for the top once again, and forms a subtle competitive and cooperative relationship with Joshua Pearce (played by Damson Idris), who is considered the future of the team. 影片讲述曾在 1990 年代因比赛事故被迫退役的车手 Sonny Hayes（布拉德 · 皮特 饰）在 30 年后加入濒临解散的 F1 APXGP 车队，再度挑战巅峰，并与被视为车队未来的新秀 Joshua Pearce（达蒙森 · 伊德里斯 饰）形成微妙的竞争与合作关系。

The film recreates the F1 track atmosphere with highly realistic speed and sound design, while also balancing off-track narration, receiving praise for its high level of completion and immersion. In addition to Apple devices, the film can also be watched via the Android version of the "Apple TV" app. 影片以极具真实感的速度与音效设计再现 F1 赛场氛围，并兼顾赛道外叙事，因高度完成度与沉浸感获得好评。除苹果设备外，影片还可通过 Android 版「Apple TV」应用观看。

item.title: One Fun Thing｜腾讯元宝现在可以锐评你的王者战绩了
item.guid: One-Fun-Thing｜腾讯元宝现在可以锐评你的王者战绩了
item.description:
Yesterday, Tencent Yuanbao launched its "Honor of Kings" match review and performance analysis capabilities. From the game center's dialogue box, you can directly retrieve your performance card, and Yuanbao will automatically generate a review analysis, helping you break down data such as KDA, damage dealt percentage, and team participation rate, and even provide equipment and lineup suggestions. 昨天，腾讯元宝上线《王者荣耀》对局复盘与战绩锐评能力，从游戏中心对话框里可直接调取战绩卡片，元宝会自动生成复盘分析，帮你拆解 KDA、输出占比、参团率等数据，甚至给出出装和阵容建议。

Currently, this feature only supports QQ. When you play well, you'll receive fancy compliments, but when you play poorly, you'll be mercilessly "sharply criticized" for your problems: 目前，该功能仅支持 QQ。打得好时你能收获花式夸夸，打得菜时也会被毫不留情地「锐评」指出问题：

For example, if Xiao Qiao carries the team with her output, Yuanbao will exclaim "well-deserved"; if your jungler has a low participation rate, Yuanbao will remind you, "the team lacks crowd control and burst damage, so losing is not unfair." Its comments are both data-driven and slightly sarcastic. 比如小乔全场输出带飞，元宝会直呼「实至名归」；如果你家打野参团率低，元宝则会提醒「阵容缺控缺爆发，输得不冤」。它的点评既有数据支撑，也带点调侃意味。

Specifically, this feature can provide structured interpretations of data such as KDA, damage output percentage, damage taken percentage, and team fight participation rate for individuals and teammates. It combines opponent hero and team composition characteristics to suggest strategic tendencies like crowd control, burst damage, or protecting healers, and emphasizes the impact of factors such as different jungler strengths, lane pressure, and enemy support speed on item builds and roaming paths. 具体来看，该功能可对个人与队友的 KDA、输出占比、承伤占比、参团率等数据进行结构化解读，结合对手英雄与阵容特性给出控场、爆发、保奶等策略倾向，强调不同打野强度、兵线压力与对面支援速度等因素对出装与游走路径的影响。

item.title: 周末看什么｜《星际穿越》
item.guid: 周末看什么｜《星际穿越》
item.description:
The plot of "Interstellar" is set on Earth in the near future. Due to environmental degradation and widespread crop blight, humanity faces a severe survival crisis. The core of the story revolves around a mysterious wormhole that appears near Saturn. 《星际穿越》的剧情设定在近未来的地球。由于环境恶化与农作物大面积枯萎，人类面临严重的生存危机。故事核心围绕土星附近出现的神秘虫洞展开。

Cooper, along with Professor Brand's daughter Amelia Brand, Romilly, Doyle, and others, form an exploration team, traveling by spaceship to a distant galaxy to investigate three planets that might be suitable for human habitation. 库珀与布兰德教授的女儿艾米莉亚 · 布兰德、罗米利、多伊尔等人组成探险队，乘坐宇宙飞船前往遥远星系，考察三颗可能适合人类居住的星球。

"Interstellar" won the 87th Academy Award for "Best Visual Effects" and was nominated for "Best Original Score" in the film category at the 72nd Golden Globe Awards. As of publication, the film has been rated by 2,140,094 people on Douban, with a score of 9.4. 《星际穿越》获第 87 届奥斯卡「最佳视觉效果」，并曾获第 72 届金球奖电影类「最佳原创配乐」提名。截至发稿，本片在豆瓣已有 2140094 人评价，评分为 9.4。

item.title: 买书不读指南｜《从此世间有稀土》
item.guid: 买书不读指南｜《从此世间有稀土》
item.description:
"From Then On, Rare Earths Existed in the World" uses a popular and vivid style, taking the discovery history of rare earth elements as its main thread. Combining scientific exploration with humanistic narrative, it presents the process of scientists continuously experimenting and gradually approaching the truth over 160 years. 《从此世间有稀土》以通俗而生动的笔触、稀土元素的发现史为主线，结合科学探索与人文叙事，呈现了科学家们在 160 年间不断试错、逐步走向真理的过程。

The book details the discovery process of 17 rare earth elements, emphasizing their strategic position in modern industries, where they are known as "industrial vitamins." The author points out that rare earths play an irreplaceable role in fields such as electronic information, new energy vehicles, and military industries. 书中详细讲述了 17 种稀土元素的发现历程，强调稀土在现代产业中的战略地位，被称为「工业维生素」。作者指出，稀土在电子信息、新能源汽车、军工等领域发挥着不可替代的作用。

Yang Dun quotes Richard Feynman's view in the book, emphasizing that scientific theories are always "on a certain scale between error and truth," with no absolute right or wrong, only a process of continuous evolution. 羊顿在书中引用理查德 · 费曼的观点，强调科学理论始终处于「错误与真理之间的某个刻度」，没有绝对的正确或错误，只有不断进化的过程。

item.title: 游戏推荐｜《霍格沃茨之遗》原价 384 元免费领
item.guid: 游戏推荐｜《霍格沃茨之遗》原价-384-元免费领
item.description:
"Hogwarts Legacy," originally priced at 384 RMB, is now free on the Epic Games Store. Before December 19th, all players can claim and permanently own the game for free on the Epic platform. 原价 384 元人民币的《霍格沃茨之遗》现已在 Epic 商店开启限免，12 月 19 日前，所有玩家可在 Epic 平台免费领取并永久拥有该游戏。

"Hogwarts Legacy" is an immersive open-world action role-playing game developed by Warner Bros. Games, based on the "Harry Potter" book series. Players can customize characters, brew potions, cast spells, and explore beasts and environments in the magical world. 《霍格沃茨之遗》是一款由 Warner Bros. Games 出品的沉浸式开放世界动作角色扮演游戏，基于《哈利·波特》系列书籍设定，玩家可在魔法世界中自定义角色、调配魔药、施放咒语并探索野兽与场景。

The game was released on Steam on February 10, 2023, and currently holds a "Very Positive" player rating of 90%. IGN also gave it a "Superb" rating of 9/10. 本作于 2023 年 2 月 10 日登陆 Steam 平台，目前玩家好评率为 90%「特别好评」。媒体 IGN 亦给出 9/10 分「奇佳 」的评价。
